import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { details: string='Details'; studentName: string=''; onStudentNameChange(event:Event): void{ this.studentName=(event.target as HTMLInputElement).value; } }
